Text: Please do not use AVI files if you don't know what you are doing as most of the videos are encoded with the rare TSC2 codec found in Camtasia Stuido 8 and anyone without the codec won't be able to play most of the files, word of advice STICK TO MP4
you fucking inbred piece of shit Keep strummin' your banjo & having kids with your sister.

Only about 16 files work out of the 44 and 12 are none functioning copies of other files. None of the bear, bull and donkey files work. The only files for the dogs are the 4 watersport videos and 2 knotting videos. And only 10 of the horse files works. This is also after finding the stand alone copy of the TSC2 codec and installing Camtasia Studio 8.

In case you're still interested in downloading this and are having trouble playing the few playable videos, here is that codec: https://support.techsmith.com/entries/22849238-Camtasia-Studio-Download-the-TSC2-standalone-codec
